body: Idiot, how can he choose this over his sister -.-
there is something wrong... i like reading gender bend doujins/mangas but now that this i feel like it is wrong in a sense.. i wonder why..
i don't see anything wrong with that tbh

The Mc is addicted to female sexual pleasure and he chose to be a girl.
Yuuto offered the options for the MC and spoke of the consequences of his choice, but the MC chose to be a girl using his free will. The Mc was free to decide and the consequences are his responsibility and he could have made another choice.
The Mc goes only plunged deeper into lust. The Mc will just plunge deeper into lust and become a sexual slave of the dicks.
